TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit StringWriter extends System.IO.TextWriter

summary.span: 实现一个用于将信息写入字符串的 。

span.span: Implements a for writing information to a string.

summary.span: 该信息存储在基础 中。

span.span: The information is stored in an underlying .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 可以以同步方式还是以异步方式向字符串写入。 enables you to write to a string synchronously or asynchronously. 可以将字符写入一次或方法中，在时使用字符串或方法。You can write a character at a time with the or the method, a string at a time using the or the method. 此外，可以编写字符、 字符数组或字符串并按以异步方式使用的一个行结束符方法。In addition, you can write a character, an array of characters or a string followed by the line terminator asynchronously with one of the methods. [!INCLUDE[note_unnecessary_dispose](~/includes/note-unnecessary-dispose.md)] 下表列出了其他典型或相关的 I/O 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要执行此操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |写入一个文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |从文本文件中读取。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |将文本追加到文件。Append text to a file.|[如何：打开并追加到日志文件How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |获取文件的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |获取文件的属性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |设置文件的属性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |确定文件是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |从二进制文件中读取。Read from a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |写入二进制文件。Write to a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示创建一个连续的段落从一组双倍的句子，然后在段落的转换回原始的文本。The following code example demonstrates the creation of a continuous paragraph from a group of double-spaced sentences, and then the conversion of the paragraph back to the original text. [!code-cpp[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/CPP/stringrw.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/CS/stringrw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/VB/stringrw.vb#1)]

## Remarks 一个新自动创建并与新实例的关联对象类。A new object is automatically created and associated with the new instance of the class. 由于没有为此构造函数指定的格式控件，将使用初始化新实例。Since a format control is not specified for this constructor, the new instance will be initialized with . 下表列出了其他典型或相关的 I/O 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要执行此操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |写入一个文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |从文本文件中读取。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |将文本追加到文件。Append text to a file.|[如何：打开并追加到日志文件How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |获取文件的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |获取文件的属性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |设置文件的属性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |确定文件是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |从二进制文件中读取。Read from a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |写入二进制文件。Write to a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造字符串使用`StringWriter`类。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a string using the `StringWriter` class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 关闭当前的 和基础流。

span.span: Closes the current and the underlying stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建文件和文本写入文件的示例，请参阅[如何： 将文本写入到文件](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)。For an example of creating a file and writing text to a file, see [How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md). 从文件读取文本的示例，请参阅[如何： 从文件读取文本](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)。For an example of reading text from a file, see [How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md). 读取和写入二进制文件的示例，请参阅[如何： 读取和写入到新创建的数据文件](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)。For an example of reading from and writing to a binary file, see [How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md). 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 此实现`Close`调用方法并传递`true`值。This implementation of `Close` calls the method passing a `true` value. 除非显式调用，刷新该流不会刷新其基础编码器`Close`。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call `Close`. 设置到`true`意味着数据从缓冲区刷新到流中，但编码器状态不会进行刷新。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这将允许编码器，以便它可以正确编码的字符的下一步块保持其状态 （部分字符）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 这种情况下会影响 UTF8，UTF7 其中某些字符仅后才能进行编码的编码器收到的相邻字符。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. ## Examples 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分构造函数。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.IO.StringWriter3#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringWriter3/CPP/strwriter3.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.StringWriter3#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringWriter3/CS/strwriter3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StringWriter3#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringWriter3/VB/strwriter3.vb#2)]

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示释放托管资源和非托管资源； 表示仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写时，请小心不要引用在早期调用之前释放对象。
can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

The in which the output is written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是必需的标头必须在其中写入包含编码使用的某些 XML 方案`StringWriter`。This property is necessary for some XML scenarios where a header must be written containing the encoding used by the `StringWriter`. 这允许使用任意 XML 代码`StringWriter`并生成正确的 XML 标头。This allows the XML code to consume an arbitrary `StringWriter` and generate the correct XML header. 下表列出了其他典型或相关的 I/O 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要执行此操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |写入一个文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |从文本文件中读取。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分构造函数。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.IO.StringWriter1#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringWriter1/CPP/strwriter1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.StringWriter1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringWriter1/CS/strwriter1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StringWriter1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringWriter1/VB/strwriter1.vb#4)]

summary.span: 异步清理当前编写器的所有缓冲区，使所有缓冲数据写入基础设备。

span.span: Asynchronously clears all buffers for the current writer and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.

returns.span: 表示异步刷新操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这可以是`StringBuilder`传递给构造函数中，或`StringBuilder`自动创建。This is either the `StringBuilder` that was passed to the constructor, or the `StringBuilder` that was automatically created. 下表列出了其他典型或相关的 I/O 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要执行此操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |写入一个文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |从文本文件中读取。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分构造函数。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the constructor. summary.span: 返回包含迄今为止写入到当前 中的字符的字符串。
